org.baswell.layouts

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.baswell.layouts.View

  • public class View
extends java.lang.Object

    The content of the view. This object can be accessed in layouts using the HttpServletRequest attribute Layouts.VIEW. The Expression Language syntax for this is:

    ${view.yield(pageContext)}
